TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WebBaseEvent extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件定义基类。

span.span: Defines the base class for the ASP.NET health-monitoring events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类是所有 ASP.NET health 监视事件类型的继承树的根。The class is the root of the inheritance tree for all the ASP.NET health-monitoring event types. 它使用 类来获取可用于其派生类的应用程序信息。It uses the class to obtain application information that is available to its derived class. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型，并且将通过在 "配置" 部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统 `` 。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生，以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关从类派生的示例 ，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从 类派生，以创建自定义运行状况监视事件。The following example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom health-monitoring event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#1)] 下面的示例摘自配置文件，该文件使 ASP.NET 能够使用自定义事件。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the custom event. ``` ```

para.span: 在设置自定义事件信息的显示格式时，请重写 方法而不是 方法。

span.span: When you format your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method.

para.span: 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感系统信息。

span.span: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

para.span: 为自定义事件指定的事件代码必须大于 。

span.span: The event code you specify for your custom event must be greater than .

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述

span.span: ASP.NET Health Monitoring Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由 ASP.NET health 监视系统在内部使用。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你永远不会使用它来创建类的实例 ，但可以在实现继承自此类的事件类型时调用此构造函数。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when you implement your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. span.span: Provides standard formatting of the event information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为事件信息提供统一的格式，如果必须记录事件数据，并在以后向用户显示，则此方法非常有用。The method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 当提供程序调用其中一种方法时，将在内部调用此 方法。It is called internally when the provider invokes one of the methods. > [!NOTE] > 在设置自定义事件信息的显示格式时，请重写 方法而不是 方法。When you format your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感系统信息。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义 方法。The following code example shows how to customize the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#17)]

summary.span: 为显示而对事件信息进行格式化。

span.span: Formats event information for display purposes.
The event information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常由处理事件的提供程序调用。The method is generally invoked by the provider that processes the event. 方法可确保 向标准对象提供特定于事件的数据。The method ensures that the standard object is provided with the event-specific data. 它通过调用特定于事件的方法来设置事件信息的格式 。It formats event information by calling the event-specific method. > [!NOTE] > 在设置自定义事件信息的显示格式时，请重写 方法而不是 方法。When you format your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感系统信息。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法The following code example shows how to use the method [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#14)]

summary.span: 为显示而对事件信息进行格式化。

span.span: Formats event information for display purposes.
The event information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常由处理事件的提供程序调用。The method is generally invoked by the provider that processes the event. 它通过调用特定于事件的方法来设置事件信息的格式 。It formats event information by calling the event-specific method. 如果 `includeAppInfo` 为 `true` ，则为标准 对象提供特定于事件的数据。If `includeAppInfo` is `true`, the standard object is provided with the event-specific data. > [!NOTE] > 在设置自定义事件信息的显示格式时，请重写 方法而不是 方法。When you format your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感系统信息。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.
